overview: Jimmie Slater has a problem - he can't seem to get bigger in the gym. So he hires Saxon West as a personal trainer, and Saxon winds up helping him with his other problem, his huge erection. Dr. Matt Stevens has the solution as Justin pounds his muscle daddy. Later Jimmie is at home waiting for the plumber to fix his dishwasher. Draven Torres opens up his tool box and when Jimmie sees a dildo in there, he gives Draven the real thing and pounds him hard right in the kitchen. Fernando del Toro was repairing the fridge at Sean Duran's house. When he was done, Sean invited him into the hot tub for a steamy hot fuck.
title: Fixing the Problem
